section.name: Folder action menu
section.span: What and where is the folder action menu?

div.p: The folder action menu for the newspaper folder. The actions will be performed on the newspaper folder and the newspaper folder will become the current folder.

section.p: The folder action menu is a pull-down menu that allows the user to choose an action to perform on a folder, which becomes the current folder. Possible actions are: creating a new document or subfolder in it, deleting a subfolder from it, reordering the folder, etc.
The actions that a particular user may do on particular folder can be different for different folders.

ul.li: If you are doing the tour, use the back button of your browser to continue. (There is no hyperlink here, because you can get here from many different pages.)
